fr.liglab.adele.icasa.application

Interface ApplicationTracker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DeviceDependencyHandler

    public interface ApplicationTracker
    Tracker of available applications. After addition of a tracker, an event is generated for all existing applications.
    Author:
    Thomas Leveque
